Chicopee.Evans Court Apartment Building: The Evans Court Apartment Building is a historic eight-unit apartment building at 22-24 Winthrop Street in the South End of Springfield, Massachusetts. It is a four-story brick structure, shaped like an L, with a section projecting to the left at its rear. The front facade has three-story projecting polygonal bays flanking the center entrance, which are topped by decorative cartouches.
